name: Ghosts and Gourds
description:
As soon as you woke up, you knew that you wanted to escape the cemetery. But, just as you were about to exit, a spectral pumpkin has forced you into a deadly battle! However, during the fight, you are not confined to your physical form, as you can press the space key to turn into a ghost & be invulerable to attacks! Defeat the undead gourd, and escape the graveyard once and for all!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Weapon

Space - Transform In/Out of Ghost Form

CREDITS:

Jamchills - Code, Art, SFX

Tinyworlds - Font (Thaleah Fat)

DST - Music (Tower Defense Theme)
